settings.text: Get notified when we launch. Coming Summer 2023.

custom_css: .email-signup-banner h2 {font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 70px; line-height: 68px; /* identical to box height */ align-items: center; text-align: inherit; background: linear-gradient( 90deg, #efe240 0%, #e2bf57 14.06%, #e6a36d 31.31%, #e98777 44.41%, #9e3d59 58.79%, #903052 73.16%, #65243e 86.26%, #4e1132 100% ); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; text-fill-color: transparent;}
